title: Mentoring
content: Do the mentors keep everything we say to them confidential?

comments.body: Can't guarantee that, don't talk shit about other teachers to them, they're closer to their colleagues than u will ever be (this is from experience)

Nope, most don't. At this point, the way it is, the mentor program is just a meaningless formality. Don't talk shit about other teachers to your mentor, there's a high chance they'll just snitch because most of the faculty are closer than you think. Also generally, don't talk about stuff that you aren't comfortable with sharing unless you're sure they can help
